headline: Is ServiceNow’s AI Experience Platform Launch and Expanded Partnerships Reshaping the Investment Case for NOW?
summary: On September 30, 2025, ServiceNow unveiled its AI Experience platform, introducing a unified conversational interface, new agentic AI features, and integration with both its native and third-party large language models, all positioned to enhance enterprise workflow automation, customer service, and sales capabilities. The launch underscores ServiceNow’s commitment to secure, transparent, and flexible AI deployment while expanding partnerships with industry leaders like Cloudera, Five9, and...

headline: Infosys Expands Partnership to Strengthen its Position in IT and AI
summary: INFY deepens its Sunrise partnership to implement digital transformation and AI for the latter.

headline: Synechron Acquires Three Firms, Creating Largest Global ServiceNow Practice in Banking and Financial Services Sector
summary: Synechron, a leading global digital transformation consulting firm, today announced the formation of a new global ServiceNow business via the acquisitions of RapDev, Calitii and Waivgen.

headline: Five9, Inc. (FIVN) Launches Five9 Fusion for ServiceNow
summary: Five9 Inc. (NASDAQ:FIVN) is one of the cheap AI stocks to buy right now. On September 16, the company launched Five9 Fusion for ServiceNow. The AI-powered solution is designed to provide a unified customer service experience. Five9 Fusion unifies voice and digital interactions through a time AI transcription stream. It also features a single routing […]
